description: Enterprise techniques used by Out1, ATT&CK software S0594 (v1.0)
name: Out1 (S0594)

techniques.comment: [Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) can use HTTP and HTTPS in communications with remote hosts.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) can use native command line for execution.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) can copy files and Registry data from compromised hosts.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) can parse e-mails on a target machine.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
[Out1](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0594) has the ability to encode data.(Citation: Trend Micro Muddy Water March 2021)
